scripts.dev: npx @11ty/eleventy --config=eleventyconfig.js --serve & npx tailwindcss -i src/assets/styles/tailwind.css -c src/assets/styles/tailwind.config.js -o dist/css/style.css --watch
scripts.build: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true npx @11ty/eleventy --config=eleventyconfig.js && NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -i src/assets/styles/tailwind.css -c src/assets/styles/tailwind.config.js -o dist/css/style.css --minify
